parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

title: IView.GetVisibleEntities2
description: Gets the visible entities of the specified type for the specified component in this drawing view.
signature:
System.Object GetVisibleEntities2( 
   Component2
LpViewComponent
,
   System.Int32
EntityType
)

parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

returns: Array of the visible entities of EntityType in LpViewComponent
remarks:
Visible entities are entities that are not completely obscured by other entities in the view.
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IView::GetVisibleEntities method is that this method supports silhouette edges (EntityType = swViewEntityType_e.swViewEntityType_SilhouetteEdge).
